snippet: The State Department credited the Iraqi government with playing a role in winning their release by Shiite militiamen.
abstract: Iraqi authorities negotiate release of three Americans who were kidnapped by militiamen in Baghdad in January; details surrounding capture and negotiation remain unclear.

byline.contributor: Falih Hassan and Omar Al-Jawoshy contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The State Department credited the Iraqi government with playing a role in winning their release by Shiite militiamen.

headline.main: 3 Americans Kidnapped in Baghdad Are Released
headline.print_headline: Iraq Negotiates the Release of 3 Americans Abducted by a Shiite Militia in Baghdad
